description: Committee inspection reveals BCI fragments enforcing different rules in separate sectors, prompting widespread reports of inconsistent treatment and mounting fear.
Committee, heeding Nikola’s plea for unity, cancels technical support for the spiral override and drafts an emergency plan to negotiate a single, citywide protocol with all sectors.
Zones remain locked into rival subsystems as negotiation stalls, everyday life splinters, and citizens begin to experience divergent realities based on legacy faction rules.
